(amụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe osise nke ógè a. Washington bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York.

na Alexandria, Louisiana na 1972. Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ hụrụ sayensị n'anya, mana ọ makwaara na ọ chọrọ ịbụ ónyé na-ese ihe mgbè ọ dị obere. Ọ tolitere n'ebe nkwado dị ukwuu, ebe ọ bụghị naanị nne na nna ya kamakwa ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ gbara ya ume ịzụlite nkà nka ya. Mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi nka mbụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya dị na Alexandria, nke mere ka mmasị ya na nka na-eto ngwa ngwa.
O nwetara ákàrà ugo mmụta MFA ya na Tufts University / School of the Museum of Fine Arts Boston, na ákàrà ugo mmụta BFA na Louisiana State University.
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na The Studio Museum na Harlem, The Contemporary Arts Museum Houston, Saatchi Gallery na London, na Museum of Science and Industry na Chicago.

Site na Jenụwarị ruo Machị 2020, Mahadum nke Michigan Museum of Art gosipụtara ọrụ Washington na ihe ngosi akpọrọ Cullen Washington, Jr.: The Public Square Ọ bụ ezie na a haziri ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ruo na Mee, e belatara ihe ngosi ahụ mgbe ụlọ ngosi ahụ mechiri n'etiti Machị n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19. N'ihi ya, ébé ngosi nka ahụ tinyere ọrụ Washington na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ ha dị ka ihe ngosi n'ịntanetị.

Washington abụwo ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Amherst College (2016ī17), Fountainhead Residency (2016), The Studio Museum in Harlem (2013); Rush Arts Gallery (2012), Yaddo (2011), na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture (2010).

Ihe osise Washington na-ejikarị ihe ndị dị ka "tape, canvas, acrylic paint, charcoal dust, Black chalkboard paint, akwụkwọ, Black copier toner, acrylik medium, Black ink, Kraft paper, wax coated cotton string, latex house paint, rubber, waya, hot plastic glue na ear cushions". Ọ kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka "nke na-anọchite anya".
